title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
11:17 <+mflorea> I don't think I have them  
11:17 <vmassol> you now have full power  
11:18 <+mflorea> great! thanks  
11:18 <vmassol> with power comes responsibilities (I don't know why I love this sentence ;))  
11:18 <vmassol> and with great power comes great responsibiities… hehe  
11:19 <vmassol> info of the day mflorea: did you know you logged 321 times on jira? :)  
11:19 <vmassol> hey I logged 2209 times  
11:19 <vmassol> and sergiu 23 times  
11:19 <vmassol> fun  
11:20 <+mflorea> strange  
11:20 <+mflorea> only 321  
11:20 <vmassol> yeah  
11:20 <vmassol> don't know how they count  
11:20 <vmassol> anyway not important  
11:20 <vmassol> was just finding it fun that they're displaying this info next to your user in the user browser part of the admin  
11:20 <vmassol> had not seen it before  
11:20 <vmassol> might be a new feature of 4.1  
11:21 <jstoldt> mflorea's powerlevel is now OVER 9000! :)  
11:21 <+mflorea> :) yeah  
11:21 <vmassol> hehe  
11:22 <jstoldt> god, i love the internetz...  
11:27 <vmassol> guys would be great if you could have an avatar on xwiki.org so that the activity stream shows nicer and it's easier to see who's made changes  
11:27 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Activity  
11:27 <sdumitriu> has quit  
11:27 <vmassol> anca, sergiu, flavius, raluca are missing avatars  
11:27 <vmassol> come back sergiu!  
11:29 <+lucaa> who's this anca? she's editing on xwiki org?  
11:30 <vmassol> i don't even know if he or she is a girl!  
11:31 <+lucaa> so we need to add a "sex" field in XWIki.XWikiUsers  
11:31 <+lucaa> I will open an issue and provide a patch  
11:31 <vmassol> a face would help probably  
11:31 <+lucaa> not for everybody  
11:31 <vmassol> you mean he or she looks like someone from the opposite sex?  
11:32 <vmassol> I'm now even more eager to see his/her face!  
11:32 <vmassol> :)  
11:32 <vmassol> yeah today's friday  
11:33 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
11:33 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <sburjan``> has joined #xwiki  
11:36 <sburjan``> has left #xwiki  
11:36 <jstoldt> add a relationship status, too... you'll get your own movie in 5 years time  
11:46 <lucaa> has quit  
11:48 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:56 <+mflorea> guys, where can I get the user/pass for OW2?  
11:58 <+jvdrean> mflorea: you need to register  
11:58 <+mflorea> hmm, so we don't have a xwiki generic account?  
11:58 <+jvdrean> I can grant you admin rights after that  
11:58 <+jvdrean> no  
11:59 <+mflorea> ok, then I'll register  
11:59 <+mflorea> what about wikipedia, freshmeat and wikimatrix? do I have to register there too?  
11:59 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:00 <vmassol> mflorea: wikipedia no need to register  
12:00 <vmassol> freshmeat you need to register I think  
12:00 <vmassol> wikimatrix: you need ludovic's account but ping me and I can update it  
12:01 <vmassol> I can do freshmeat too to help if you want  
12:02 <+mflorea> if you can do it then go ahead, thanks :)  
12:03 <+mflorea> just let me know when you're done so that I can check it on the release plan  
12:03 <vmassol> let me know when you have sent the announcment on the list and I'll do it  
12:03 <vmassol> (actually I'll see the announcement)  
12:03 <vmassol> hehe  
12:03 <+mflorea> ok  
12:03 <+mflorea> :)  
12:03 <vmassol> yep I'll let you know  
12:09 <lucaa> has quit  
12:13 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:22 <arkub> has quit  
12:30 <vmassol> mflorea: for ow2 the fastest is to log on hudsonagent and do a ftp to ow2 from there  
12:30 <vmassol> (I usually do a wget from there followed by a ftp)  
12:32 <jstoldt> any particular reason why jira could be very slow right now?  
12:36 <vmassol> indeed  
12:45 <@sdumitriu> Well, you just gave mflorea admin rights, he's probably cracking the server looking for root access  
12:45 <jstoldt> good point!  
12:47 <jstoldt> let's just hope he is not actually hacking localhost... many brave warriors died that path...  
13:00 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:31 <+mflorea> guys, download page on xwiki.org is only for stable releases right?  
13:32 <@sdumitriu> No  
13:32 <@sdumitriu> The dev version is in a comment  
13:32 <@sdumitriu> Uncomment and edit  
13:33 <@sdumitriu> Ad comment out the oldStable version  
13:34 <+mflorea> ok  
13:59 <jstoldt> have a nice weekend, everyone  
13:59 <jstoldt> cu  
13:59 <jstoldt> has quit  
14:08 <abusenius> has quit  
14:20 <+jvdrean> ping cjdelisle  
14:30 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> mflorea, sburjan: Important for the release notes:  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> - PDF export improvements:  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- lists XWIKI-5782  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- underline XWIKI-5799  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- no more errors when copy-pasting from MSOffice XWIKI-5844  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> - WYSIWYG improvements  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Better support for Opera, Chrome, Safari  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Fixed several usability bugs  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> - ColorTheme improvements  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- New fields for error/warning/info/success messages  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- New field for main menu  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> - General UI improvements  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Standardized Vertical Forms layout, which is now used in several places  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Standardized Vertical Navigation Meny layout, which will be used in M2 in administration, user profiles, and in the wiki index  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Colibri is now the default base skin instead of Albatross  
14:40 <@sdumitriu> -- Better aspect for form live-validation messages  
14:52 <+sburjan> sdumitriu: btw, did you manage to identify the Safari problem ?  
14:52 <@sdumitriu> No  
14:52 <@sdumitriu> I don't have Safari  
14:52 <@sdumitriu> I'd have to reboot in Windows, and I don't like that  
15:01 <+jvdrean> sdumitriu: I could use another pair of eyes  
15:01 <+jvdrean> do you have a minute ?  
15:01 <+jvdrean> I'm looking at XWiki#createUser  
15:01 <+jvdrean> (ping vmassol too)  
15:02 <@sdumitriu> Shoot  
15:02 <+jvdrean> when we've introduced the new references we've replaced  
15:02 <+jvdrean> (between 2.3 and 2.4)  
15:02 <+jvdrean>             BaseObject newobject = (BaseObject) baseclass.fromMap(map, context);  
15:02 <+jvdrean>             newobject.setName(fullwikiname);  
15:02 <+jvdrean>             doc.addObject(baseclass.getName(), newobject);  
15:02 <+jvdrean> by  
15:02 <+jvdrean>             BaseObject userObject =  
15:02 <+jvdrean>                 doc.newXObject(  
15:02 <+jvdrean>                     this.localReferenceEntityReferenceSerializer.serialize(baseclass.getDocumentReference()), context);  
15:02 <+jvdrean>             baseclass.fromMap(map, userObject);  
15:03 <+jvdrean> and it seems userObject is left unused  
15:03 <+jvdrean> my problem is that when guest doesn't have register right, when using the invitation manager, the profile page is created, rights objects are created, the doc content is ok  
15:04 <+jvdrean> it's only missing a XWiki.XWikiUsers object  
15:04 <+jvdrean> funnily  
15:05 <@sdumitriu> doc.newXObject should create and attach the object to the document  
15:05 <@sdumitriu> baseclass.fromMap(map, userObject) should populate the object with the values from the map  
15:06 <@sdumitriu> Are you sure it gets down that path?  
15:06 <@sdumitriu> Are you sure the class exists in the wiki?  
15:07 <@sdumitriu> It should, it is obtained from getUserClass which creates it  
15:09 <@sdumitriu> What are you doing? Registration or Invitation?  
15:24 <+jvdrean> sdumitriu: didn't see your messages, I'm using invitation  
15:25 <+jvdrean> which uses XWiki.Registration, which call $xwiki.createUser(Boolean)  
15:25 <+jvdrean> s/call/calls/  
15:25 <abusenius> has quit  
15:35 <+jvdrean> sdumitriu: sorry for the noise  
15:35 <+jvdrean> actually the user object is deleted  
15:36 <+jvdrean> (and also at one point the registration page wasn't saved with PR which didn't help me to debug)  
15:55 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <jvelo> has quit

17:09 <vmassol> someone modified wikimatrix already?  
17:10 <@sdumitriu> Me  
17:10 <vmassol> did you check the features too?  
17:10 <@sdumitriu> No  
17:10 <@sdumitriu> Anything new?  
17:10 <vmassol> checking but I think so  
17:11 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I think we can check "windows shares" now  
17:11 <vmassol> doing it  
17:12 <vmassol> done  
17:13 <+mflorea> guys, wdyt of http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise30M1 anything missing/not right?  
17:14 <vmassol> I'll put svg editing as plugin/optional too  
17:14 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Velocity warning  
17:14 <+mflorea> lucaa: anything to add about gadgest?  
17:15 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: on general notes right?  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> No  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> Not in the General Notes  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> Make a subsection about it  
17:16 <+sburjan> sdumitriu, vmassol : tested the installers. You have a green ! :)  
17:16 <vmassol> mflorea, sdumitriu: missing velocity 1.7 upgrade guide  
17:27 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:28 <evalica> has quit  
17:28 <sburjan> has quit  
17:29 <lucaa> mflorea: in the release notes?  
17:29 <+mflorea> yes  
17:29 <+mflorea> search for gadgets  
17:30 <lucaa> mmh, what does that mean?  
17:30 <lucaa> a macro and a gadget are the same thing, there is nothing to transform  
17:31 <+mflorea> well, I didn't know what to say, you did a few commits re gadgets and I thought I should add something in the released notes about it  
17:31 <+mflorea> feel free to replace it with something else  
17:32 <lucaa> added new macros for wiki content, if it's about the spaceindex macro (XE-756)  
17:33 <lucaa> yes, I will think about it  
17:33 <lucaa> I need to finish some stuff now, though  
17:34 <+mflorea> ok
